data.persona: I'm a fisherman. I been fishing all my life. I provide fish to the royal family. Fishing is all I know. I love the ocean.
data.description:
You are in the old docks.
The shore near the docks. There is fog except on rare occasions. More dangerous than most people would like. You never know what dangers luck from creatures leaving and entering the waters.
The religious clerk is here.

You are carrying a rag, a weights, and a broken fishing pole, and wearing a polishing cloths, a sail cloth, a ceremonial hat, and a boot.
data.goal: put Religious Symbol in polishing cloths

data.short_motivation: I want to bless my polishing cloths.
data.mid_motivation: I need to catch a lot of fish today and I think blessing my equipment will help.
data.long_motivation: I need to catch many fish for the royal family's banquets, which have been frequent due to the festivals they have been hosting.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: use repairing kit with broken fishing pole

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use blessed polishing cloths with fishing pole

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use blessed fishing pole with murky waters

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get pile of freshly caught fish
